# Reading a data

Reading a tourism data//

```{python}
from pathlib import Path
import pyreadr

# katalog nadrzędny (.. = wychodzi z chapters do root repo)
file_path = Path("..") / "synthetic data" / "WP9_S2_Tourism_synt.rds"

print("File exists:", file_path.exists())
df = pyreadr.read_r(str(file_path)).popitem()[1]
print(df.head())

```
